title: Voyage à travers un film (Sauve qui peut (la vie))
original_title: Voyage à travers un film (Sauve qui peut (la vie))
overview: A televisual journey guided by Jean-Luc Godard inside his film Sauve qui peut (la vie), incorporating filmed conversations between him and Isabelle Huppert and the film critic Christian Defaye.
synopsis: A televisual journey guided by Jean-Luc Godard inside his film Sauve qui peut (la vie), incorporating filmed conversations between him and Isabelle Huppert and the film critic Christian Defaye.
